body_html: So checkSameGPU in TensorUtils.cpp calls TensorArg->get_device which is only implemented for cuda. The options seem to be amending checking for cuda before doing that in checkSameGPU, doing a cuda check before calling it or implementing get_device for CPU. I'm leaning towards the first because we'd probably not be able to use the output of get_device for CPU in the error message.

body: So `checkSameGPU` in `TensorUtils.cpp` calls `TensorArg->get_device` which is only implemented for cuda. The options seem to be amending checking for cuda before doing that in `checkSameGPU`, doing a cuda check before calling it or implementing `get_device` for CPU. I'm leaning towards the first because we'd probably not be able to use the output of `get_device` for CPU in the error message.
